'[[List of Maccabi sports clubs and organisations|Maccabi]] Tel Aviv Football
Club' (; Moadon Kaduregel Maccabi Tel Aviv) is an Israeli football club and part
of the Maccabi Tel Aviv sports club. It is one of the oldest clubs in Israeli
football, and is the most successful club in Israeli football history with 20
championships, 22 national cups, 2 Asian Champions Cups, and 3 Toto cups.
Maccabi has won the championship and the cup in the same season (referred to as
winning the "double") six times, and are the only club in Israel never to have
played outside the top division. Maccabi has been crowned as the Israeli fooball
league champions for the current season 2012-13.
categories: Football clubs in Israel|Tel Aviv F.C.
